component.name: Dwarf Fortress
component.summary: A single-player procedurally generated fantasy game

description.p: Dwarf Fortress is a single-player fantasy game. You can control a dwarven outpost or an adventurer in a randomly generated, persistent world.
Although Dwarf Fortress is still in a work in progress, many features have already been implemented.
Dwarf Fortress is free to redistribute, but is not open source.
